system.requirements: Adept or Tech-Priest Career, DH Rank 4+. Intelligence 30+, Fellowship 30+
system.descriptionText: Liars and Dissasemblers, those who read the ebb and flow of a noble court, who can sense the taint of madness beneath a facaade, the rot of corruption beneath words of piety. These individuals are cornerstones of covert investigations, rarely revealing themselves to any.
system.effects: Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Bonded Emissary
